| A burning fern sprout:* can [survive underwater](/wiki/Amphibious "Amphibious").
* [does not breathe](/wiki/Breathless "Breathless").
* cannot pick up items.
* has [no eyes](/wiki/Eyeless "Eyeless").
* has no hands.
* has no limbs.
* has no head.
* is [mindless](/wiki/Mindless "Mindless").
* [does not eat](/wiki/Inediate "Inediate"). (\*)
* is not a valid [polymorphable](/wiki/Polymorph "Polymorph") form.
* is neither male nor female.
* is normally generated [hostile](/wiki/Hostile "Hostile").
* [never leaves a corpse](/wiki/Corpseless "Corpseless").
* cannot be [tamed](/wiki/Scroll_of_taming "Scroll of taming").
* [does not move](/wiki/Sessile "Sessile"). |                                                                                                                                                                                    |
html:
Burning fern sprout

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
{ burning fern sprout (No tile)
Difficulty 16
Attacks Claw 5d6 physical, Claw 5d6 fire, Gaze attack 0d0 spore, Passive 5d6 physical
{ burning fern sprout (No tile)
Difficulty 16
Attacks

Claw 5d6 physical, Claw 5d6 fire, Gaze attack 0d0 spore, Passive 5d6 physical

Base level 12
Base experience 318
Speed 6
Base AC 10
Base MR 0
Alignment 0 (neutral)
Frequency (by normal means) 0 (Not randomly generated)
Genocidable No
Weight 20
Nutritional value 200
Size small
Resistances fire, poison
Resistances conveyed poison

A burning fern sprout:

  • can survive underwater.
  • does not breathe.
  • cannot pick up items.
  • has no eyes.
  • has no hands.
  • has no limbs.
  • has no head.
  • is mindless.
  • does not eat. (*)
  • is not a valid polymorphable form.
  • is neither male nor female.
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • never leaves a corpse.
  • cannot be tamed.
  • does not move.

Retrieved from "https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Burning_fern_sprout&oldid=131434"
